document.discussion_title: Mobily launches unlimited internet for 10GB recharge
document.topic_text: Mobily launches unlimited internet for 10GB recharge 35 CET | News Saudi operator Mobily, has announced the provision of unlimited internet for prepaid data packages and prepaid voice line subscribers when they recharge with a 10 GB voucher. Mobily clarified that all existing and new subscribers can take advantage of the unlimited Internet for one month on the usage of the 10GB recharge.

Mobily clarified that all existing and new subscribers can take advantage of the unlimited Internet for one month on the usage of the 10GB recharge.
